languages.text: "Ложно, ложно осудили. Оклеветали! Мол, она со злым умыслом отравила целый зал высоких господ. Пирожными! Что за нелепица. Да так, что господа эти самые пирожные до отхожих мест не успевали донести. Шумиха! Паника! Скандал! А в итоге-то что? В итоге все хозяева. Достали где-то ящик "изысканного каликсийского вина". Ха! У контрабандистов-то и достали. Ну а те что? Те, конечно, надули. А девочку-то мою осудили!"

traits.locale_text: "Ложно, ложно осудили. Оклеветали! Мол, она со злым умыслом отравила целый зал высоких господ. Пирожными! Что за нелепица. Да так, что господа эти самые пирожные до отхожих мест не успевали донести. Шумиха! Паника! Скандал! А в итоге-то что? В итоге все хозяева. Достали где-то ящик "изысканного каликсидского вина". Ха! У контрабандистов-то и достали. Ну а те что? Те, конечно, надули. А девочку-то мою осудили!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: "Falsely accused, falsely accused! She was slandered! They said she deliberately poisoned a whole room of highborn folk. With cakes! Have you ever heard the like of it? These nobles didn't even make as far as the privy! Panic! Outrage! Scandal! And so what? It was their own fault, that's what! A crate of 'Fine Calixian Wine' was found. Ha! And the smugglers were found too. And what did the smugglers do? They framed someone else. And my daughter was charged!"
languages.original_text: "Ложно, ложно осудили. Оклеветали! Мол, она со злым умыслом отравила целый зал высоких господ. Пирожными! Что за нелепица. Да так, что господа эти самые пирожные до отхожих мест не успевали донести. Шумиха! Паника! Скандал! А в итоге-то что? В итоге все хозяева. Достали где-то ящик "изысканного каликсийского вина". Ха! У контрабандистов-то и достали. Ну а те что? Те, конечно, надули. А девочку-то мою осудили!"

traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: “那些都是诬陷，都是诽谤！她是被人陷害的！他们说，她故意在蛋糕里下毒，毒害了一屋子的贵族！这种事情你听说过吗？那群人甚至连查都没查，就草草结案了！这简直太令人震惊了！简直是太荒唐了！我告诉你，那些人之所以被人下毒，都是他们自找的！有人在那些贵族那里发现了一箱高档卡利西斯葡萄酒，于是走私葡萄酒的人也被揪出来了。那些走私犯又是怎么做的呢？他们栽赃给了别人！于是我的女儿就被起诉了！”
languages.original_text: "Falsely accused, falsely accused! She was slandered! They said she deliberately poisoned a whole room of highborn folk. With cakes! Have you ever heard the like of it? These nobles didn't even make as far as the privy! Panic! Outrage! Scandal! And so what? It was their own fault, that's what! A crate of 'Fine Calixian Wine' was found. Ha! And the smugglers were found too. And what did the smugglers do? They framed someone else. And my daughter was charged!"

traits.locale_text: “那些都是诬陷，都是诽谤！她是被人陷害的！他们说，她故意在蛋糕里下毒，毒害了一屋子的贵族！这种事情你听说过吗？那群人甚至连查都没查，就草草结案了！这简直太令人震惊了！简直是太荒唐了！我告诉你，那些人之所以被人下毒，都是他们自找的！有人在那些贵族那里发现了一箱高档卡利西斯葡萄酒，于是走私葡萄酒的人也被揪出来了。那些走私犯又是怎么做的呢？他们栽赃给了别人！于是我的女儿就被起诉了！”
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: «¡Cargos falsos, le digo! ¡Nada más que calumnias! Dijeron que envenenó una sala entera llena de nobles. ¡Con tartas! ¿Alguna vez ha oído algo así? ¡Los nobles ni siquiera llegaron a las letrinas! ¡Pánico! ¡Caos! ¡Escándalo! ¿Y qué pasó en realidad? ¡Pues que fueron ellos mismos, qué si no! Encontraron una caja de "buen vino calixiano". ¡Ja! Y también a los contrabandistas que se lo vendieron. ¿Y qué hicieron? Culpar a otra persona. ¡A mi hija!».
languages.original_text: "Falsely accused, falsely accused! She was slandered! They said she deliberately poisoned a whole room of highborn folk. With cakes! Have you ever heard the like of it? These nobles didn't even make as far as the privy! Panic! Outrage! Scandal! And so what? It was their own fault, that's what! A crate of 'Fine Calixian Wine' was found. Ha! And the smugglers were found too. And what did the smugglers do? They framed someone else. And my daughter was charged!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Cargos falsos, le digo! ¡Nada más que calumnias! Dijeron que envenenó una sala entera llena de nobles. ¡Con tartas! ¿Alguna vez ha oído algo así? ¡Los nobles ni siquiera llegaron a las letrinas! ¡Pánico! ¡Caos! ¡Escándalo! ¿Y qué pasó en realidad? ¡Pues que fueron ellos mismos, qué si no! Encontraron una caja de "buen vino calixiano". ¡Ja! Y también a los contrabandistas que se lo vendieron. ¿Y qué hicieron? Culpar a otra persona. ¡A mi hija!».
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: 「えん罪だ、えん罪なんだよ！イリーナは中傷されたんだ！娘がわざとハイボーンの部屋を汚したって。ケーキでだぞ！そんな話、聞いたことあるか？こんな貴族どもが当事者にもならなかった！パニックだと！侵害だと！醜聞だと！それがどうした？奴ら自身の過失じゃないか、そうに決まってる！『高級カリシャン・ワイン』の木箱が見つかったんだと。へえ！その密輸者も分かったってさ。その密輸者が何をしたって？他の誰かに罪を着せたんだよ。俺の娘にな！」
languages.original_text: "Falsely accused, falsely accused! She was slandered! They said she deliberately poisoned a whole room of highborn folk. With cakes! Have you ever heard the like of it? These nobles didn't even make as far as the privy! Panic! Outrage! Scandal! And so what? It was their own fault, that's what! A crate of 'Fine Calixian Wine' was found. Ha! And the smugglers were found too. And what did the smugglers do? They framed someone else. And my daughter was charged!"

traits.locale_text: 「えん罪だ、えん罪なんだよ！イリーナは中傷されたんだ！娘がわざとハイボーンの部屋を汚したって。ケーキでだぞ！そんな話、聞いたことあるか？こんな貴族どもが当事者にもならなかった！パニックだと！侵害だと！醜聞だと！それがどうした？奴ら自身の過失じゃないか、そうに決まってる！『高級カリシャン・ワイン』の木箱が見つかったんだと。へえ！その密輸者も分かったってさ。その密輸者が何をしたって？他の誰かに罪を着せたんだよ。俺の娘にな！」
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: « Les accusations portées à son encontre sont entièrement fausses ! Tout ça n'est que pure calomnie ! À en croire la version officielle, elle aurait empoisonné une assemblée d'aristocrates avec des petits gâteaux ! Non mais franchement ! Apparemment, ces fichus nobliaux n'ont même pas eu le temps d'aller aux toilettes ! Je vous laisse imaginer le scandale ! Et tout ça pour quoi ? Si vous voulez mon avis, ils ne peuvent s'en prendre qu'à eux-mêmes. Une caisse de "vin millésimé de Calixis" a été retrouvée sur place. Ha ! Quand les contrebandiers se sont fait prendre, ils se sont empressés de faire porter le chapeau au premier innocent venu. Et c'est ma pauvre fille qui en a fait les frais ! »
languages.original_text: "Falsely accused, falsely accused! She was slandered! They said she deliberately poisoned a whole room of highborn folk. With cakes! Have you ever heard the like of it? These nobles didn't even make as far as the privy! Panic! Outrage! Scandal! And so what? It was their own fault, that's what! A crate of 'Fine Calixian Wine' was found. Ha! And the smugglers were found too. And what did the smugglers do? They framed someone else. And my daughter was charged!"

traits.locale_text: « Les accusations portées à son encontre sont entièrement fausses ! Tout ça n'est que pure calomnie ! À en croire la version officielle, elle aurait empoisonné une assemblée d'aristocrates avec des petits gâteaux ! Non mais franchement ! Apparemment, ces fichus nobliaux n'ont même pas eu le temps d'aller aux toilettes ! Je vous laisse imaginer le scandale ! Et tout ça pour quoi ? Si vous voulez mon avis, ils ne peuvent s'en prendre qu'à eux-mêmes. Une caisse de "vin millésimé de Calixis" a été retrouvée sur place. Ha ! Quand les contrebandiers se sont fait prendre, ils se sont empressés de faire porter le chapeau au premier innocent venu. Et c'est ma pauvre fille qui en a fait les frais ! »
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: "Fälschlicherweise vorgeworfen! Sie wurde verleumdet! Sie sagten, sie hätte absichtlich einen ganzen Raum voller Hochwohlgeborener vergiftet. Mit Kuchen! Habt Ihr so etwas schon mal gehört? Diese Adligen haben es nicht mal mehr auf die Toilette geschafft! Panik! Wut! Skandal! Na und? Es war ihre eigene Schuld! Eine Kiste mit 'gutem Wein aus Calixi' wurde gefunden. Ha! Und die Schmuggler wurden auch gefunden. Und was haben die Schmuggler gemacht? Sie haben jemand anderen beschuldigt. Und meine Tochter wurde angeklagt!"
languages.original_text: "Falsely accused, falsely accused! She was slandered! They said she deliberately poisoned a whole room of highborn folk. With cakes! Have you ever heard the like of it? These nobles didn't even make as far as the privy! Panic! Outrage! Scandal! And so what? It was their own fault, that's what! A crate of 'Fine Calixian Wine' was found. Ha! And the smugglers were found too. And what did the smugglers do? They framed someone else. And my daughter was charged!"

traits.locale_text: "Fälschlicherweise vorgeworfen! Sie wurde verleumdet! Sie sagten, sie hätte absichtlich einen ganzen Raum voller Hochwohlgeborener vergiftet. Mit Kuchen! Habt Ihr so etwas schon mal gehört? Diese Adligen haben es nicht mal mehr auf die Toilette geschafft! Panik! Wut! Skandal! Na und? Es war ihre eigene Schuld! Eine Kiste mit 'gutem Wein aus Calixi' wurde gefunden. Ha! Und die Schmuggler wurden auch gefunden. Und was haben die Schmuggler gemacht? Sie haben jemand anderen beschuldigt. Und meine Tochter wurde angeklagt!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: "Asılsızdı suçlamalar, asılsız! İftira attılar ona! Güya kasten koca bir oda dolusu soyluyu zehirlemiş dediler. Hem de pastayla! Böyle bir şey duyan oldu mu hiç? Soylular helaya bile koşamadan hık diye gitmiş! Telaş! Hiddet! Skandal! Peki neden mi? Kendi suçlarıymış da o yüzden! Bir kasa Calixis şarabı bulmuşlar, hem de 'en güzelinden'. Ha! Kaçakçıları da bulmuşlar tabii. Peki kaçakçılar ne yapsa beğenirsiniz? Bir başkasına komplo kurmuşlar. Kabak benim kızımın başına patlamış!"
languages.original_text: "Falsely accused, falsely accused! She was slandered! They said she deliberately poisoned a whole room of highborn folk. With cakes! Have you ever heard the like of it? And the smugglers were found too. And what did the smugglers do? They framed someone else. And my daughter was charged!"
